paper_abstract: We describe an animation creation system called PASCAL that supports sketch-based modeling and physics augmented locomotion simultaneously. The system uses sketches and reconfigurable space canvases as basic modeling primitives and uses physics to improve the expressiveness and efficiency of several animation techniques to obtain controllable and plausible locomotion animation. The usability evaluation of the system was conducted both with professional and novice animators. Copyright (C) 2009 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: PASCAL: physics augmented space canvases for animating locomotion
